name: Data Engineer Curriculum (EQF Level 5)
description: Curriculum for Data Engineer at EQF Level 5

role.name: Data Engineer
role.description: Implements and optimizes digital infrastructure with minimal environmental impact

modules.name: Edge Computing for Sustainability (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Leveraging edge computing to create efficient, low-energy sustainable systems (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify edge computing principles and architectures for sustainable systems.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how processing data at the edge reduces energy consumption and environmental impact.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement edge computing solutions that optimize resource usage in sustainability applications.

modules.name: Work-based Sustainability Project (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Apply sustainability knowledge in real-world workplace settings (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Recognize organizational contexts for sustainability project implementation.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain sustainability project management methodologies in workplace settings.
learning_outcomes.skills: Execute a sustainability initiative in a real-world professional environment.

modules.name: Low-Carbon Cloud Infrastructure (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Design and implement energy-efficient cloud computing solutions (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify cloud infrastructure components and their energy consumption patterns.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain strategies for reducing carbon footprint in cloud computing environments.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement and optimize low-carbon cloud infrastructure solutions.

modules.name: Advanced Data Engineering for Sustainability (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Building and maintaining data infrastructure for sustainability applications (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify data engineering requirements specific to sustainability applications.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain approaches to designing efficient data pipelines for sustainability metrics.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement and maintain data infrastructure that supports sustainability initiatives.

modules.name: IoT for Environmental Monitoring (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Using Internet of Things technologies for sustainability monitoring and management (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify IoT architectures and technologies applicable to sustainability monitoring.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how sensor networks can provide real-time environmental data for decision-making.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement IoT solutions for monitoring environmental parameters and resource usage.

modules.name: Technical Implementation and Tool Support
modules.description: Configure and maintain technical tools supporting sustainability goals

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify appropriate sustainability tools and technical implementation requirements.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain configuration approaches for sustainability monitoring platforms.
learning_outcomes.skills: Configure and maintain technical tools supporting organization-specific sustainability goals.

modules.name: Big Data for Environmental Intelligence (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Leverage big data technologies to analyze environmental patterns and trends (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify big data technologies applicable to environmental monitoring and analysis.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how large-scale data processing can enhance environmental intelligence.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement big data solutions to process and analyze environmental datasets.

modules.name: Digital Twin and Smart Systems for Green Transition (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Apply digital twin technology to model and optimize sustainable systems (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify digital twin technologies and smart systems applicable to sustainability challenges.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how digital twins can optimize resource use and support green transition.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement digital twin solutions to monitor and improve environmental performance.

modules.name: Big Data for Environmental Intelligence (EQF 4 Version) (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Leverage big data technologies to analyze environmental patterns and trends (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.) (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Critically evaluate big data technologies applicable to environmental monitoring and analysis.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Synthesize how large-scale data processing can enhance environmental intelligence.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement big data solutions to process and analyze environmental datasets.

modules.name: Sustainable Software Engineering (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Implement sustainable programming practices and optimize code efficiency (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify energy-efficient coding practices and their environmental impact.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain the relationship between software design choices and resource consumption.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement green coding principles to optimize software energy efficiency.

modules.name: Systems Architecture for Sustainability (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Design IT systems aligned with circular economy and low-impact principles (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Describe system architecture principles that support sustainability goals.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how system design decisions affect long-term sustainability performance.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design IT system architectures that minimize environmental footprint while maintaining functionality.

modules.name: Data Analytics for Sustainability (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Use data tools to derive actionable sustainability insights (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify data analysis methods suitable for sustainability contexts and challenges.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Evaluate tools and techniques for data-driven sustainability assessments.
learning_outcomes.skills: Use analytics tools to extract sustainability insights from basic datasets.

modules.name: DevOps and Sustainable Deployment (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Implement efficient and sustainable software deployment practices (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify DevOps practices that support sustainable software deployment.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how continuous integration/deployment affects resource efficiency.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement DevOps pipelines optimized for sustainability considerations.

modules.name: AI-Driven Environmental Risk Modelling (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Apply AI and machine learning to model and mitigate environmental risks (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify AI methodologies applicable to environmental risk assessment.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how AI can enhance prediction and management of environmental risks.
learning_outcomes.skills: Develop AI-driven models to forecast and mitigate environmental impacts.

modules.name: Energy-Efficient Software Architecture (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Design software architectures optimized for energy efficiency (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify architectural patterns that promote energy efficiency in software systems.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain the relationship between architecture decisions and long-term energy consumption.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design software architectures optimized for energy efficiency and sustainability.

modules.name: Green IT Service Management
modules.description: Principles and practices for managing IT services with a focus on environmental sustainability

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify best practices for reducing the environmental impact of IT services.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Analyze IT service delivery in terms of energy efficiency and lifecycle impact.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design and manage IT services with minimized environmental footprint.

modules.name: Data Ethics and Governance in Practice (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Implement ethical data governance approaches for sustainability initiatives (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify data governance frameworks and ethical principles for sustainability data.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain the practical challenges of implementing data ethics in sustainability contexts.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply data governance practices that ensure ethical use of sustainability information.

modules.name: Climate Resilience through Digital Solutions (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Applying digital technologies to enhance climate resilience in organizations and communities (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify climate risks and resilience opportunities addressable through digital technologies.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain connections between climate adaptation, mitigation, and digital solutions.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design digital interventions that enhance climate resilience in specific organizational contexts.

modules.name: Sector-Specific Digital Sustainability Applications (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Applying digital sustainability principles to specific industry domains (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify sustainability challenges and opportunities in specific industry sectors.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how digital sustainability principles must be adapted to sector-specific contexts.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply digital sustainability approaches to address sector-specific challenges.

modules.name: Advanced Visualisation for Sustainability Reporting (EQF 5 Version)
modules.description: Create effective data visualizations to communicate sustainability performance (This module has been adapted for EQF level 5.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify fundamental visualization techniques for sustainability data communication.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how visual representations can effectively communicate sustainability metrics.
learning_outcomes.skills: Create compelling visual narratives of sustainability performance for diverse stakeholders.

program_learning_outcomes: Apply advanced principles of digital sustainability to various professional contexts
Evaluate sustainability impacts of digital technologies using appropriate frameworks
Implement sustainability-focused improvements in digital systems and workflows
Communicate sustainability considerations to diverse stakeholders
Collaborate effectively in teams addressing digital sustainability challenges
